## Bio

My background is in statistics. I work in measurement: A/B tests, causal inference, and survey methods. Trying to be less wrong. 

Interested in remote sensing, sports, and elections data.

I enjoy running marathons and film photography.

```{r}
#| echo: false
```

```{r}
# clean post URLs thanks to https://blog.djnavarro.net/posts/2022-04-20_porting-to-quarto/#netlify-redirects

# list names of post folders
posts <- list.dirs(
  path = here::here("posts"),
  full.names = FALSE,
  recursive = FALSE
)

# extract the slugs, remove date
slugs <- stringr::str_sub(gsub("^.*_", "", posts), 12, -1)

# lines to insert to a netlify _redirect file
redirects <- paste0("/", slugs, " ", "/posts/", posts)

# add cv
redirects <- c(
  redirects, 
  paste0("/cv /files/jacob-eliason-cv.pdf"),
  paste0("/resume /files/jacob-eliason-resume.pdf")
)

# write the _redirect file into both the rendered site and repo root so redirects stay fresh
dir.create(here::here("_site"), showWarnings = FALSE, recursive = TRUE)
writeLines(redirects, here::here("_site", "_redirects"))
writeLines(redirects, here::here("_redirects"))
```
